channel.title: Help with commands
channel.description: Hi im working on a blank source which means no starter command etc, plus im a beginner in coding so, could someone tell me how to add the starter command to my source? Thanks in advance. :)

item.title: Help with commands
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Project Czar (cleaned) could be counted as a blank source. Starting from almost scratch is like rs2dv…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with commands
item.dc:creator: @java_is_my_bitch1 java is my bitch.
item.description:
@java_is_my_bitch1 wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:12, topic:256653”][quote author=java is my bitch. link=topic=338972.msg2629606#msg2629606 date=1232060227]

[quote author=x blitz x link=topic=338972.msg2629602#msg2629602 date=1232059956]

Why are you starting on a server from scratch if you can’t even make a simple if statement?..
[/quote]I agree.

He didn’t say he was making one from scratch, he said he was working on a blank source.
[/quote]A blank source is scratch.

No. A blank source is what ever the person using it says is blank. Blank could just be logging in and player rendering, that doesn’t make it scratch.

Scratch is like public class Server { // Add Code } [/quote]ok whatever makes you sleep at night.

Read full topic

[/quote]I agree.

He didn’t say he was making one from scratch, he said he was working on a blank source.
[/quote]A blank source is scratch.[/quote]
No. A blank source is what ever the person using it says is blank. Blank could just be logging in and player rendering, that doesn’t make it scratch.

Scratch is like public class Server { // Add Code }
